Document.summary: Interface for streams. Stream functions are grouped into 5 categories: 1) Feature testing functions. 2) Read functions, available only if returns true. 3) Peek functions, available only if returns true. 4) Write functions, available only if returns true. 5) Seek functions, available only if returns true. 6) Size functions, available only if returns true. But there are still some streams knows that the content is limited, but the size is unknown. In this case, will return -1.
